subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the oldest fort of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में किस सबसे आयी हुई कठिनाई है।
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is the oldest and largest of all forts in Rajasthan.
